title: Website Chatbot
description: An Azure-based AI chatbot for “Made with Nestlé,” offering real-time answers via dynamic scraping, vector indexing, and GraphRAG with Cosmos DB.

title: Snowboard Ecommerce
description: A modern snowboard e-commerce site with featured products, cart sidebar, multi-step checkout, and user dashboard. Built with React, Vite, Node.js, and Firebase.

title: News Brain
description: A Flask-based platform for real-time news collection, filtering, summarization with BART, and report editing. It supports user management, local and Docker deployment, and integrates MySQL, Redis, MongoDB, and Nginx for a complete backend infrastructure.

title: Music Recommender
description: A real-time music recommender system built with Spark Streaming, Kafka, Flume, Redis, and MongoDB, it updates results live based on user behavior. Includes LFM-based algorithm, Angular-Spring web app, and Docker-based deployment
